subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wettstone led Penn State University to a record nine N.C.A.A. championships in the sport, and also coached the U.S. men’s teams in the 1948 and 1956 Olympic Games.
snippet: Mr. Wettstone led Penn State University to a record nine N.C.A.A. championships in the sport, and also coached the U.S. men’s teams in the 1948 and 1956 Olympic Games.
